(They did take a piece of her arm) *Mantella flipped backwards dodging
Injector's missiles and quickly moved her leg to dodge the ion disks heading
toward her knee but jumps to the side of the ones heading toward her chest
and gets hit in the same arm the other disks did and now that arm is getting
a little weak. Then she shoots eye lasers at Injector and Manterror and
ducks down and foot sweeps Double Punch*
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 04, 2000 12:33 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> (Excuse me lizards, they are ion disks, i-o-n, not iron.  So, if they hit
you
> in the arm, they would drill until they got past the armor, and hit your
> internal stuff (under the armor).  So, either do your little "change it so
> nothing happens" or take proper damage, and read more carefully please)
>
> Manterror/Injector/Double Punch:
>
>
> Double Punch, a little angry sidestepped to the right 5 feet, not wanting
to
> give away his position by standing in the same place and firing like an
> idiot.  Raising his pincher once more, it hit together a few times,
opening,
> two missiles fired at Quickstrike's left knee.
>
>
> Manterror jumped back five feet, dodging the dive by Mantella easily.
> Ducking under her spin kick, he fired two ion disks at her left knee, and
two
> at her chest (two from each ion disk shooter-thingy that they gave no
> description for in the profile attached to his arms).
>
>
> Injector laughed.  "How utterly pathetic." he said, raising his stinger
> missile launcher, firing off three missiles at Mantella's abdomen.
>
